text: 普通の食物を友達と食べれる!
style: font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 7.94%;top: 3.64%;width: 12.77%;height: 7.04%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
マイロが
死にかけて
困ることも
ない!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 8.17%;top: 10.68%;width: 12.89%;height: 7.46%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
世界を見れば
リケットの
人生バラ色さ!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 28.94%;top: 4.48%;width: 12.05%;height: 9.56%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
お…
おかしいな。
列車内に雨が
降ってるみたい
